table.name: meals
table.sqlString: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `meals` ( `ID` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL auto_increment, `name` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `description` text NOT NULL, `price_class` smallint(6) NOT NULL, `date` date NOT NULL, `max_orders` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`ID`) ) AUTO_INCREMENT=1 ;

table.name: users
table.sqlString: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `users` ( `ID` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL auto_increment, `name` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `forename` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `username` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `password` varchar(32) NOT NULL, `birthday` date NOT NULL, `credit` decimal(6,2) NOT NULL, `GID` smallint(5) unsigned NOT NULL, `last_login` timestamp NOT NULL, `login_tries` smallint(5), `first_passwd` boolean NOT NULL, `locked` boolean NOT NULL, `soli` boolean NOT NULL, `class` varchar(5) NOT NULL, `religion` varchar(3) NOT NULL, `foreign_language` varchar(30) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`ID`) );

table.name: price_classes
table.sqlString: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `price_classes` ( `ID` smallint(5) unsigned NOT NULL auto_increment, `name` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `GID` smallint(5) NOT NULL, `price` decimal(6,2) NOT NULL, `pc_ID` smallint(5) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`ID`) )AUTO_INCREMENT=1;

orders
table.sqlString: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `orders` ( `ID` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL auto_increment, `MID` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL, `UID` bigint(11) unsigned NOT NULL, `date` date NOT NULL, `IP` binary(16) NOT NULL, `ordertime` timestamp NOT NULL, `fetched` boolean NOT NULL default 0, PRIMARY KEY (`ID`) )

table.name: cards
table.sqlString: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `cards` ( `ID` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL auto_increment, `cardnumber` varchar(10) NOT NULL, `UID` bigint(11) unsigned NOT NULL, `changed_cardID` int(11) unsigned, PRIMARY KEY (`ID`) )AUTO_INCREMENT=1;

table.name: logs
table.sqlString: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `logs` ( `ID` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL auto_increment, `category` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `severity` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `time` timestamp NOT NULL, `message` varchar(255) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`ID`) )AUTO_INCREMENT=1;

table.name: administrators
table.sqlString: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `administrators` ( `ID` smallint(5) unsigned NOT NULL auto_increment, `name` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `password` varchar(32) NOT NULL, `GID` smallint(5) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`ID`) )AUTO_INCREMENT=1;

table.name: soli_orders
table.sqlString: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `soli_orders` ( `ID` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL auto_increment, `UID` bigint(11) unsigned NOT NULL, `date` date NOT NULL, `IP` binary(16) NOT NULL, `ordertime` timestamp NOT NULL, `fetched` boolean NOT NULL default 0, `mealname` varchar(255) NOT NULL , `mealprice` DECIMAL( 6, 2 ) NOT NULL , `mealdate` DATE NOT NULL, `soliprice` DECIMAL( 6, 2 ) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`ID`) )

table.name: schbas_books
table.sqlString: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `schbas_books` ( `id` smallint(5) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `subject` varchar(3) NOT NULL, `class` varchar(25) NOT NULL, `title` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `author` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `publisher` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `isbn` varchar(17) NOT NULL, `price` float(4,2) NOT NULL, `bundle` smallint(1) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) )

table.name: schbas_fee
table.sqlString: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `schbas_fee` ( `id` smallint(5) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `class` varchar(5) NOT NULL, `fee_normal` float(4,2) NOT NULL, `fee_reduced` float(4,2) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) )

table.name: schbas_inventory
table.sqlString: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `schbas_inventory` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `book_id` smallint(5) NOT NULL, `year_of_purchase` smallint(4) NOT NULL, `exemplar` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) )

table.name: schbas_lending
table.sqlString: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `schbas_lending` ( `user_id` bigint(20) NOT NULL, `inventory_id` int(11) NOT NULL, `lend_date` date NOT NULL, KEY `user_id` (`user_id`) )

table.name: schbas_specific
table.sqlString: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `schbas_spezific` ( `ID` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `book_id` int(10) NOT NULL, `class` varchar(5) NOT NULL, `notify_only` tinyint(1) NOT NULL, `info` longtext NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`ID`) )
